attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This legendary former Glasgow Celtic & Liverpool player/manager has been a credit to his profession and was probably one of the greatest footballers ever to play the game in Britain but his actions after the Hillsborough tragedy in 1989 spoke volumes about his compassion as a person with his never ending counselling of the bereaved  and injured as well as attending so many of the funerals after the disaster was truly amazing and he deserves to receive the highest possible recognition

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
